title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added three new staging environments: `staging-balsam`, `staging-hinoki`, and `staging-yew` with deployment configurations.
Converted `convert-markdown-for-docs.js` to TypeScript (`convert-markdown-for-docs.ts`) with type annotations and interface definitions.
Added evergreen tree images (`balsam.png`, `hinoki.png`, `yew.png`) and included them in asset exception lists.
Updated workflow description in `ready-for-doc-review.yml` by removing DIY docs label reference.
Added new staging names to the `stagingNames` set in frontend code (`app.tsx`).

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added three new staging environments: `staging-balsam`, `staging-hinoki`, and `staging-yew` with deployment configurations.
- Converted `convert-markdown-for-docs.js` to TypeScript (`convert-markdown-for-docs.ts`) with type annotations and interface definitions.
- Added evergreen tree images (`balsam.png`, `hinoki.png`, `yew.png`) and included them in asset exception lists.
- Updated workflow description in `ready-for-doc-review.yml` by removing DIY docs label reference.
- Added new staging names to the `stagingNames` set in frontend code (`app.tsx`).
